organisation_name: Associació pel Desenvolupament Rural de la Catalunya Central (ADRCatCentral)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit:
The ADRCatCentral is a non-profit association, recognized as a Local Action Group (LAG) by the Ministry of Agriculture of the Generalitat de Catalunya, and whose main objective is "Central Catalonia, territory of quality", having as central pillars: 
- Territory and environment valorisation as elements of cohesion an territorial responsibility 
- Promoting enterpreneurship 
- Bet on human capital and improve employability 
The ADRCatCentral is one oo the GAL's distributed throughout the rural territory of Catalonia, which have been recognized as collaboration agencies of the administration in order to manage the Leader methodology, within the frameword of the Rural Development Program of Catalonia for the period 2014-2020.
